description: Born on April 1, Raimei is a 14-year-old guardian of the world of Nabari, and the head of the Shimizu clan. She is also a Fuuma-nin ("Wind Magic/Demon Ninja") who prefers fighting with a sword named Kurogamon over using ninjutsu, claiming to be a samurai. She has the tendency to mistake one person for another, or reveal information she means to keep to herself, when excited. Five years ago, her older brother, Raikou, annihilated their clan, and she has sworn to kill him in revenge.
name: Shimizu Raimei
